testGetReaderEnforcingOfCorrectEncoding

public void testGetReaderEnforcingOfCorrectEncoding()
                                             throws Exception
Make sure the correct character encoding is set before the reader is returned. Otherwise we might get strange default encodings from the servlet engine.

Throws:
Exception

testGetInputStreamEnforcingOfCorrectEncoding

public void testGetInputStreamEnforcingOfCorrectEncoding()
                                                  throws Exception
Make sure the correct character encoding is set before the inputStream is returned. Otherwise we might get strange default encodings from the servlet engine.

Throws:
Exception
